channel.title: The MannersCast
channel.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong
channel.itunes:keywords: manners, etiquette, relationship, family, office, corporate, eat, dating, car, elevator, kids, marriage, sport, film, restaurant, comedy, laugh, mac, apple, alabama, children, gervais, relationships, love, 7th, sigler, parking, love, friend, rule, hutchins, handicapped, neighbor, rules, chivalry, phone, cell, telephone, improv, hilarious, awesome, run, ipod, mp3
channel.itunes:subtitle: A fun look at everyday manners.
channel.itunes:summary: You probably aren't living the way we think you should! The MannersCast is a fun look at everyday manners for everyday situations. We take a light-hearted look at society and how to get back to the good ol' days... or maybe even how to take over the world (EVIL LAUGHTER!)

item.title: EP.120- MannersCast Christmas Special
item.description: By popular demand we would like to present The MannersCast Christmas Special.
item.itunes:subtitle: By popular demand we would like to present The MannersCast Christmas Special.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.119- Better Than We Found It
item.description: Listen to The MannersCast from Episode 1. In this episode we hear from Listener Art about Family Manners and Loaning Money to Family, a manners success story, and an update on Doug and Julia.
item.itunes:subtitle: Listen to The MannersCast from Episode 1. In this episode we hear from Listener Art about Family Manners and Loaning Money to Family, a manners success story, and an update on Doug and Julia.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.118- Excused MannersPass
item.description: Listener Anne responds to The MannersCast Challenge and that brings us to a discussion of restaurant seating manners. You are certain to learn something about yourself when we talk about big groups at restaurants. Listener Katy also sends in her Report!
item.itunes:subtitle: Listener Anne responds to The MannersCast Challenge and that brings us to a discussion of restaurant seating manners. You are certain to learn something about yourself when we talk about big groups at restaurants. Listener Katy also sends in her Report!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: 002-NewSciFi-MovieTalk
item.description: With a couple of cool, new (and very different) Sci Fi movies out in 2011, we wanted to catch up with each other and talk movies again! Source Code and HANNA are the subjects of this podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: With a couple of cool, new (and very different) Sci Fi movies out in 2011, we wanted to catch up with each other and talk movies again! Source Code and HANNA are the subjects of this podcast.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.117- Food Chariots
item.description: Join us for a discussion of Trolley Theives and shopping cart manners, Colin is turned down for a Library Card, we hear from Esther about a prank, and we talk snappy comebacks.
item.itunes:subtitle: Join us for a discussion of Trolley Theives and shopping cart manners, Colin is turned down for a Library Card, we hear from Esther about a prank, and we talk snappy comebacks.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.116- Two Times Ned
item.description: Twitter in the News, dealing with an Unresponsive Vote, and tips on tipping. Trent talks about crowding in a swimming pool.
item.itunes:subtitle: Twitter in the News, dealing with an Unresponsive Vote, and tips on tipping. Trent talks about crowding in a swimming pool.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.115- Worst Wedding Game Ever
item.description: Mark from the UK sent us an Anti-Guide for Elevator Etiquette. Trent uses a range of terrible accents to convey this list. We also revisit the question of the Wedding Registry and take a look at how to respond to difficult situations in friends' lives. Wa
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark from the UK sent us an Anti-Guide for Elevator Etiquette. Trent uses a range of terrible accents to convey this list. We also revisit the question of the Wedding Registry and take a look at how to respond to difficult situations in friends' lives. Wa
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.114- Sneeze Cloud
item.description: Colin talks about his near death experience in an elevator, and Trent's eyes are opened by a sneeze cloud. Should you take a vacation from your cell phone? Babies can fly just give them something to drink. Finally, we offer our first MannersCast Challenge.
item.itunes:subtitle: Colin talks about his near death experience in an elevator, and Trent's eyes are opened by a sneeze cloud. Should you take a vacation from your cell phone? Babies can fly just give them something to drink. Finally, we offer our first MannersCast Challenge.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: 001-Inception-MovieTalk
item.description: Director Christopher Nolan has turned in another restaurant-quality film. Inception is a thriller that leaves the audience with something to talk about-- so we did. WARNING: There are spoilers in this episode!
item.itunes:subtitle: Director Christopher Nolan has turned in another restaurant-quality film. Inception is a thriller that leaves the audience with something to talk about-- so we did. WARNING: There are spoilers in this episode!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.113- Ladies Room
item.description: Join Trent as The Modern Manners Guy in The Ladies Room, a radio program on an Irish Radio Station. Also, Trent has turned in his Modern Manners Guy hat and offers his fond farewell.
item.itunes:subtitle: Join Trent as The Modern Manners Guy in The Ladies Room, a radio program on an Irish Radio Station. Also, Trent has turned in his Modern Manners Guy hat and offers his fond farewell.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.112-The Food Show
item.description: Join us for a public service announcement about watching out for pedestrians, mistaking gender, and business meetings in public. If that wasn't enough, Colin has a proper rant about Classic Rock in video games and taking kids to a show on a cruise ship.
item.itunes:subtitle: Join us for a public service announcement about watching out for pedestrians, mistaking gender, and business meetings in public. If that wasn't enough, Colin has a proper rant about Classic Rock in video games and taking kids to a show on a cruise ship.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.111- Fool Glasses
item.description: We answer an email from MannersCastian Jenn about how to navigate a hallway where people are walking toward you, and we discuss sitting or standing on a bus.
item.itunes:subtitle: We answer an email from MannersCastian Jenn about how to navigate a hallway where people are walking toward you, and we discuss sitting or standing on a bus.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.110- Not Your Mother
item.description: Rules for the June 2010 Contest. More talk about netiquette and cleaning up after yourself.
item.itunes:subtitle: Rules for the June 2010 Contest. More talk about netiquette and cleaning up after yourself.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.109- Rooster Toaster Cover
item.description: Thankfully accepting Wedding Shower Gifts, and what do you do when scissors are gross?
item.itunes:subtitle: Thankfully accepting Wedding Shower Gifts, and what do you do when scissors are gross?
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.108- Podfading
item.description: The MannersCast is not podfading. Derek has a standoff in the handicapped movie seats. A woman tries to rally the strangers to destroy the theater owner!
item.itunes:subtitle: The MannersCast is not podfading. Derek has a standoff in the handicapped movie seats. A woman tries to rally the strangers to destroy the theater owner!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.107- You're You
item.description: Katie from NY has a celebrity encounter, and we discuss how to be a mannerly celebrity. Then snuggle by the fire for a heartwarming manners story.
item.itunes:subtitle: Katie from NY has a celebrity encounter, and we discuss how to be a mannerly celebrity. Then snuggle by the fire for a heartwarming manners story.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.106- Pigeon Holed
item.description: Xerophites emails in about business email wars, we hear about Nick's proposal, and we get a list of things that are annoying.
item.itunes:subtitle: Xerophites emails in about business email wars, we hear about Nick's proposal, and we get a list of things that are annoying.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.105- Earplugs
item.description: Talk of gossip and how to tell folks you don't allow booze in your house.
item.itunes:subtitle: Talk of gossip and how to tell folks you don't allow booze in your house.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.104- Surprise Elevator
item.description: A listener bluejay story, an in-depth discussion of who has the right-of-way when exiting an elevator, and how to deal with Rude Coworkers.
item.itunes:subtitle: A listener bluejay story, an in-depth discussion of who has the right-of-way when exiting an elevator, and how to deal with Rude Coworkers.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.103- Girls Go First
item.description: Beverage Station Manners and Ethics, Girls Go First, Pool Deck Manners and Laundromat Manners.
item.itunes:subtitle: Beverage Station Manners and Ethics, Girls Go First, Pool Deck Manners and Laundromat Manners.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.102- Get Your Stink Back
item.description: Protesting with manners, serious feedback, and Derek has a stinky friend. We also look at poking fun at someone for being too skinny.
item.itunes:subtitle: Protesting with manners, serious feedback, and Derek has a stinky friend. We also look at poking fun at someone for being too skinny.

item.title: EP.101-Let's Get This Party Started
item.description: A little listener feedback, concert manners, Xerophytes has roommate money problems, lending money, protesting and bus manners.
item.itunes:subtitle: A little listener feedback, concert manners, Xerophytes has roommate money problems, lending money, protesting and bus manners.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.100- We're Breaking Up
item.description: Biggest Episode EVER lately! A history lesson on The MannersCast, a Breakup, something Gross, Favorite Vocab, Govmt Manners, and Taking Free Stuff- whew!
item.itunes:subtitle: Biggest Episode EVER lately! A history lesson on The MannersCast, a Breakup, something Gross, Favorite Vocab, Govmt Manners, and Taking Free Stuff- whew!

item.title: EP.97- Kids In Charge

item.description: Office hygiene. How to handle a co-worker with a cold and what to do to keep your office kitchen clean-- moron.

item.title: EP.46- Country Come to Town
item.description: Trent is joined by Traci and Leslie from Alabama to talk about DANGEROUS DRIVING and GETTING IN THE WAY.
item.itunes:subtitle: Trent is joined by Traci and Leslie from Alabama to talk about DANGEROUS DRIVING and GETTING IN THE WAY.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.45 SPECIAL: Vampire Manners
item.description: This is the episode we recorded for the Buffy between the Lines podcast at Buffy between the Lines dot com. In episode 44 of The MannersCast we mentioned checking it out , and even though you're listening to it now, you should still give a peek over there if it sounds interesting to you.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is the episode we recorded for the Buffy between the Lines podcast at Buffy between the Lines dot com. In episode 44 of The MannersCast we mentioned checking it out , and even though you're listening to it now, you should still give a peek over there if it sounds interesting to you.

item.title: EP.44- The Theatre
item.description: Colin's trip to The Theatre provides a handful of topics for this, the second installment of The Episode 43-44 Special Event.
item.itunes:subtitle: Colin's trip to The Theatre provides a handful of topics for this, the second installment of The Episode 43-44 Special Event.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.43- Concept Transfer
item.description: SPECIAL TWO WEEK EVENT - Episode 43 and 44 were recorded right back to back but have nothing really in common. Episode 43 includes Walking Down Stairs Manners, Correcting Grammar, and a new term "Concept Transfer".
item.itunes:subtitle: SPECIAL TWO WEEK EVENT - Episode 43 and 44 were recorded right back to back but have nothing really in common. Episode 43 includes Walking Down Stairs Manners, Correcting Grammar, and a new term "Concept Transfer".
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.42- Running, Skiing, Biking. Oh MY!
item.description: Warning that you're coming by and getting out of the way are just the tip of the iceberg for these topics. Make sure you're ready for the race with our outstanding advice.
item.itunes:subtitle: Warning that you're coming by and getting out of the way are just the tip of the iceberg for these topics. Make sure you're ready for the race with our outstanding advice.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.41- New Orleeens
item.description: We discuss the continuing saga of Doug and Julia, Gas Station Dance Party, and the Manners of Pronouncing Place Names.
item.itunes:subtitle: We discuss the continuing saga of Doug and Julia, Gas Station Dance Party, and the Manners of Pronouncing Place Names.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.40- Personal Space
item.description: Are you standing too close? We talk about distance from person to person, hygiene, and Inuit Eskimos.
item.itunes:subtitle: Are you standing too close? We talk about distance from person to person, hygiene, and Inuit Eskimos.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.39- Reclining in Airplanes
item.description: It's the one year anniversary of The MannersCast. We do a little year in review of the show and then address an email about reclining in airplanes.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's the one year anniversary of The MannersCast. We do a little year in review of the show and then address an email about reclining in airplanes.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.38- An EPIC Journey
item.description: An email from listener Bruce sparks another discussion of Cells Phones in the Movie Theater, and we take an epic journey with one of Derek's friends and his Facebook sweetheart.
item.itunes:subtitle: An email from listener Bruce sparks another discussion of Cells Phones in the Movie Theater, and we take an epic journey with one of Derek's friends and his Facebook sweetheart.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.37- On the Plane
item.description: We have an Exception to The Rules, visit (via email) with listener David, and then we board the airplane for a dissection of Airline Manners Issues.
item.itunes:subtitle: We have an Exception to The Rules, visit (via email) with listener David, and then we board the airplane for a dissection of Airline Manners Issues.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.36- Airports
item.description: What job? In this episode we discuss doing jobs when you see they need to be done and how to treat others at the Airport.
item.itunes:subtitle: What job? In this episode we discuss doing jobs when you see they need to be done and how to treat others at the Airport.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.35- Felons and Vegetarians
item.description: Cammie from Montgomery, AL is pulled over, and one of our vegitarian listeners gets "fed-up"! Sometimes being mannerly is the safe thing to do.
item.itunes:subtitle: Cammie from Montgomery, AL is pulled over, and one of our vegitarian listeners gets "fed-up"! Sometimes being mannerly is the safe thing to do.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.34- Net-iquette
item.description: An interview with Trent on the Mac Tips Daily podcast. A brief history of The MannersCast plus online net-iquete for email, instant messaging, and sharing your feelings about your computer. Check out ThinkMac.net!
item.itunes:subtitle: An interview with Trent on the Mac Tips Daily podcast. A brief history of The MannersCast plus online net-iquete for email, instant messaging, and sharing your feelings about your computer. Check out ThinkMac.net!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: EP.33- Gifts AGAIN? and My Degree
item.description: The email from Diane was a great reason to get back into this. Also, in this Episode we discuss when people use their Major as an excuse to correct others.... like they can't help it!
item.itunes:subtitle: The email from Diane was a great reason to get back into this. Also, in this Episode we discuss when people use their Major as an excuse to correct others.... like they can't help it!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.32- Peeing in Planters
item.description: Kids tinkling in public and pointing out automobile shortcomings.
item.itunes:subtitle: Kids tinkling in public and pointing out automobile shortcomings.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.31- Medical Taster
item.description: Public Arguments, Late Birthday Phone Calls, Receiving Gifts. Can it get anymore confrontational??? I submit that it cannot!
item.itunes:subtitle: Public Arguments, Late Birthday Phone Calls, Receiving Gifts. Can it get anymore confrontational??? I submit that it cannot!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.30- Ummmmmmm
item.description: Doing Favors for Strangers REDUX, FAKE TIP of the WEEK, UMMMM, Public Ridicule, and Writing Checks.
item.itunes:subtitle: Doing Favors for Strangers REDUX, FAKE TIP of the WEEK, UMMMM, Public Ridicule, and Writing Checks.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.29-Paying, Parking, and Favors
item.description: Discussion about not pitching in for gifts, poaching parking spaces, and how far are you will to let someone go when they are putting you out or asking favors?
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussion about not pitching in for gifts, poaching parking spaces, and how far are you will to let someone go when they are putting you out or asking favors?
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.28-Table Manners
item.description: Table Manners... everyone, pay attention!
item.itunes:subtitle: Table Manners... everyone, pay attention!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.27-Bored
item.description: Waiting for slow eaters, checking out friends' activities, and taking credit... can Trent pay attention through the enitre episode? Find out on another riveting MannersCast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Waiting for slow eaters, checking out friends' activities, and taking credit... can Trent pay attention through the enitre episode? Find out on another riveting MannersCast.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.26-Christmas Episode 2
item.description: Spreading more cheer than one podcast can handle. Mistletoe in the office, Carolling Manners, and "To Santa Claus or To Not Santa Claus." Topic 3 might not be appropriate for little, "believing" ears...
item.itunes:subtitle: Spreading more cheer than one podcast can handle. Mistletoe in the office, Carolling Manners, and "To Santa Claus or To Not Santa Claus." Topic 3 might not be appropriate for little, "believing" ears...
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.25-Christmas Episode 1
item.description: Christmas is coming! In this episode we discuss listener email woes about planning a trip with friends, Christmas Cards, and the crazy gift exchange.
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas is coming! In this episode we discuss listener email woes about planning a trip with friends, Christmas Cards, and the crazy gift exchange.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.24-Grammar Manners and Gifting
item.description: The Manners of Grammar and an Interview with MannersMom, Leah Ingram.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Manners of Grammar and an Interview with MannersMom, Leah Ingram.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.23-Public Restrooms! YAY!
item.description: If you feel strongly, go discuss this topic in the Blog! No Talking, Hygene, and Keeping a Clean Area. All these topics and more are very important to maintaining a certain level of social sanity.
item.itunes:subtitle: If you feel strongly, go discuss this topic in the Blog! No Talking, Hygene, and Keeping a Clean Area. All these topics and more are very important to maintaining a certain level of social sanity.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.22-PDA and "Yes, Sir"
item.description: We answer listener email about Public Display of Affection and cover whether or not we should teach our kids to say "Yes, Ma'am" and "Yes, Sir".
item.itunes:subtitle: We answer listener email about Public Display of Affection and cover whether or not we should teach our kids to say "Yes, Ma'am" and "Yes, Sir".
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.21-Good Dinner Guests
item.description: Ding Dong! Where's the food? From arrival to "after dinner" we talk about how to be a great guest and really make your host feel like having you back.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ding Dong! Where's the food? From arrival to "after dinner" we talk about how to be a great guest and really make your host feel like having you back.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.20-Taking Advantage of Friends
item.description: T-Shirt Contest Winner! We answer some emails and talk about taking advantage of kind gestures. It's also time to get to the bottom of whether or not people should talk about Steven's weight. http://www.therulespodcast.com
item.itunes:subtitle: T-Shirt Contest Winner! We answer some emails and talk about taking advantage of kind gestures. It's also time to get to the bottom of whether or not people should talk about Steven's weight. http://www.therulespodcast.com
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.19-Slowpokes and Cancellations
item.description: Excuse me! Pardon me! How do we deal with slow walkers? When is the cutoff for pulling out of an event or commitment?
item.itunes:subtitle: Excuse me! Pardon me! How do we deal with slow walkers? When is the cutoff for pulling out of an event or commitment?
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Halloween Special
item.description: A sacrificial offering of Halloween Manners from the ghoulish hosts of The MannersCast. Be sure to listen for the film trailer for The Score a horrifying new holiday fright fest.
item.itunes:subtitle: A sacrificial offering of Halloween Manners from the ghoulish hosts of The MannersCast. Be sure to listen for the film trailer for The Score a horrifying new holiday fright fest.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.18-Who Gets the Check?
item.description: Check please! Who picks up the check for dinner? Should there be an argument? It's the Big Bill Battle!
item.itunes:subtitle: Check please! Who picks up the check for dinner? Should there be an argument? It's the Big Bill Battle!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.17-Intros and Phone Manners
item.description: Who are you? Episode 17 covers introductions and not remembering people's names. Also, we discuss telephone manners from call waiting and speakerphone to talking on the phone in the toilet. Don't forget to enter in the T-Shirt Contest!
item.itunes:subtitle: Who are you? Episode 17 covers introductions and not remembering people's names. Also, we discuss telephone manners from call waiting and speakerphone to talking on the phone in the toilet. Don't forget to enter in the T-Shirt Contest!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.16-Personal Noise Level
item.description: Keep It Down! How is your personal noise level in public? Are you talking about stuff no one else wants to hear?
item.itunes:subtitle: Keep It Down! How is your personal noise level in public? Are you talking about stuff no one else wants to hear?
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.15-Talking to Strangers
item.description: When should you talk to strangers... on the bus, in the queue, by the pool? When is it frustrating? We're joined again by Steven, Rhylla and the famous John Verhoeven.
item.itunes:subtitle: When should you talk to strangers... on the bus, in the queue, by the pool? When is it frustrating? We're joined again by Steven, Rhylla and the famous John Verhoeven.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: Ep.14-Fans Watching Sports
item.description: Go Team! With college football season in full swing here in America, we take a look at being a fan in the "Stands" and at the game watching party, and Steven and Rhylla from The Rules pose a question to The MannersCast listeners. Thanks to Jim for the suggestion of the new naming scheme.
item.itunes:subtitle: Go Team! With college football season in full swing here in America, we take a look at being a fan in the "Stands" and at the game watching party, and Steven and Rhylla from The Rules pose a question to The MannersCast listeners. Thanks to Jim for the suggestion of the new naming scheme.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast-Episode-13
item.description: Hey! Your mom is calling you. We discuss disciplining other people's kids, answering machine messages, getting other people's mail.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hey! Your mom is calling you. We discuss disciplining other people's kids, answering machine messages, getting other people's mail.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast-Episode-12
item.description: Dropping off at Blockbuster, unruly kids, listener email and another visit from Steven and Rhylla of The Rules podcast... you have something in your teeth.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dropping off at Blockbuster, unruly kids, listener email and another visit from Steven and Rhylla of The Rules podcast... you have something in your teeth.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast-Episode-11
item.description: Howdy, Neighbor! In this episode we discuss attrocities and how to be a good neighbor... or at least how to use a good neighborly voice. Also, Steven and Rhylla join us from The Rules podcast to talk about correcting your boss' grammar.
item.itunes:subtitle: Howdy, Neighbor! In this episode we discuss attrocities and how to be a good neighbor... or at least how to use a good neighborly voice. Also, Steven and Rhylla join us from The Rules podcast to talk about correcting your boss' grammar.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast-Episode-10
item.description: LitterBugs! Chris joins Colin and me for a discussion of littering in public, in the restroom, and in Colin's car.
item.itunes:subtitle: LitterBugs! Chris joins Colin and me for a discussion of littering in public, in the restroom, and in Colin's car.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast-Episode-8 (Corrected)
item.description: Just Park! Episodes 8 and 9 are about Parking lot experiences ruin our lives. Pedestrians, Spot Crossing and too much waiting for a space... JUST PARK!

item.description: Let's all go to the lobby! In this episode we discuss going to the movies and the ways to not offend those around you... it's a good time for all!
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's all go to the lobby! In this episode we discuss going to the movies and the ways to not offend those around you... it's a good time for all!
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast - Episode-6
item.description: May I speak to the manager? This is the second episode in a series of discussions on manners at restaurants. As always, we look at both sides... customer and manager.
item.itunes:subtitle: May I speak to the manager? This is the second episode in a series of discussions on manners at restaurants. As always, we look at both sides... customer and manager.

item.description: May I take your order? A sly look at restaurant manners for server and customer.
item.itunes:subtitle: May I take your order? A discussion of restaurant manners for server and customer.
item.itunes:author: Trent Armstrong

item.title: MannersCast - Episode-4
item.description: Hey! Is that your truck? Episode 4 is about borrowing cars and being a guest in someone's home. Just (over) do it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hey! Is that your truck? Episode 4 is about borrowing cars and being a guest in someone's home. Just (over) do it!

item.description: Office manners and etiquette. Email, ice trays, watercooler, cursing.

item.title: MannersCast - Episode-2
item.description: This episode is all about holding doors for people. Yes, you should.
